LABEL: 0x351
STRING: 「Yukari, wake up!」

LABEL: 0x36F
STRING: 「Yukari!!」

LABEL: 0x38C
STRING: Yukari had collapsed without warning.

LABEL: 0x3B8
STRING: All I could do was watch.

LABEL: 0x3EE
STRING: Hiragino, who ran to support her as quickly as he could, continued to shout as he covered her fallen body.

LABEL: 0x442
STRING: He shook her lightly, but she was like a puppet with its strings cut.

LABEL: 0x48A
STRING: By all accounts, she was completely unconscious.

LABEL: 0x4BC
STRING: It was so sudden that I didn't even have the time to move.

LABEL: 0x50A
STRING: Hiragino immediately began examining her like the doctor he was, even though he looked more upset than me.

LABEL: 0x5D0
STRING: 「She's got a high fever――」

LABEL: 0x5F0
STRING: 「...Blood oxygen levels... and then...」

LABEL: 0x622
STRING: 「How's her pulse――?」

LABEL: 0x649
STRING: Hiragino's fingers moved busily in sync with his rapid whispers.

LABEL: 0x695
STRING: He was quick, careful, and precise―his gestures were almost those of a craftsman.

LABEL: 0x6FD
STRING: He eventually rummaged through his doctor's coat and pulled something out of his pocket.

LABEL: 0x765
STRING: It was a small, accessory-like medical device.

LABEL: 0x797
STRING: A triage tag―this was the second time I'd seen one.

LABEL: 0x7CF
STRING: Hiragino took Yukari's pale hand, which was resting on the floor, and meekly put the tag on her finger.

LABEL: 0x825
STRING: Just like he had done before when Reiri was unconscious.

LABEL: 0x876
STRING: 「Momoi... Why...?」

LABEL: 0x8A1
STRING: As he spoke, Hiragino unconsciously grasped her hand.

LABEL: 0x8E5
STRING: His other hand moved to the rosary on his chest.

LABEL: 0x91B
STRING: Feeling somewhat embarrassed, I averted my eyes.

LABEL: 0x959
STRING: An electronic sound echoed in less than ten seconds.

LABEL: 0x981
STRING: When he let go of her hand, the small tag was lit.

LABEL: 0x9C7
STRING: Its color was bright yellow――

LABEL: 0x9ED
STRING: He stared at the tag bitterly, then looked down at Yukari.

LABEL: 0xAA1
STRING: 「Category II... This is bad...」

LABEL: 0xACF
STRING: 「Damn it, she must have hit her head... She's bleeding...」

LABEL: 0xB0E
STRING: 「Blood...?」

LABEL: 0xB28
STRING: Guided by Hiragino's words, I turned my eyes to Yukari.

LABEL: 0xB56
STRING: She was lying there in a still position.

LABEL: 0xB7A
STRING: Hiragino's first aid treatment had left her sleeves rolled up and her upper-chest area bare, but nothing more disheveled than that.

LABEL: 0xBDA
STRING: There was no sign of pain on her face, and there was no blood anywhere――

LABEL: 0xCB1
STRING: Suddenly, I felt a cold sensation on my hand on the floor.

LABEL: 0xCE1
STRING: The palm of my hand was wet as I raised it to take a look.

LABEL: 0xE2F
STRING: 「Don't touch anything!」

LABEL: 0xE50
STRING: The sudden yell made me jump lightly as I was still kneeling.

LABEL: 0xE8A
STRING: I instinctively wiped my hand with the hem of my clothes.

LABEL: 0xF1E
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0xF3C
STRING: 「There's a chance that something could be transmitted through the blood.」

LABEL: 0xF7B
STRING: 「...Right, got it.」

LABEL: 0xF9F
STRING: 「Sorry for acting rashly.」

LABEL: 0xFD8
STRING: 「More importantly... Help me carry her.」

LABEL: 0x1039
STRING: This timing was bad.

LABEL: 0x105D
STRING: All of this happened right after we had talked about <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x1095
STRING: Just when we thought the situation with <COOS> was settled, <Alice> and Hikari came up.

LABEL: 0x10E5
STRING: Bacterial and viral threats, hosts and cures...

LABEL: 0x111D
STRING: Hiragino was infected, Reiri was missing, Yukari had collapsed――

LABEL: 0x1155
STRING: Shaking off a chain of unpleasant thoughts, I pulled my attention back to the reality in front of me.

LABEL: 0x11A3
STRING: I had to take care of what was happening right now.

LABEL: 0x11DD
STRING: I'd think about everything else later... First and foremost, she was the priority.

LABEL: 0x121F
STRING: I grabbed Yukari's legs with my right hand and tried to lift her up.

LABEL: 0x12DF
STRING: And then, just like that, I lost my balance.

LABEL: 0x130D
STRING: The left half of my body was numb.

LABEL: 0x1329
STRING: I couldn't put any strength into――

LABEL: 0x13BB
STRING: 「What are you doing, you idiot?!」

LABEL: 0x13EA
STRING: When I looked up to see what was going on, I saw Hiragino with an expression I had never seen before.

LABEL: 0x1436
STRING: There was anger, impatience... and fear.

LABEL: 0x14D1
STRING: Our eyes met, and for a moment, my eyes darted around awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x1577
STRING: 「...I'll carry her.」

LABEL: 0x15BA
STRING: Hiragino slowly picked Yukari up and carried her on his large back.

LABEL: 0x1617
STRING: 「Let's get back to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x163E
STRING: 「Got it...」

LABEL: 0x168A
STRING: I responded to his words with an apologetic nod.

LABEL: 0x16CA
STRING: Hiragino walked off in silence.

LABEL: 0x175C
STRING: ――I couldn't do anything to help him as he walked with the unconscious Yukari on his back.

LABEL: 0x17A6
STRING: For Hiragino, who was relatively mild-mannered, to shout like that...

LABEL: 0x17E0
STRING: He must be overwhelmed as well.

LABEL: 0x1808
STRING: I couldn't leave everything to him alone.

LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: Now that Yukari had collapsed and Hiragino was nearing his limit, I had to stay strong...

LABEL: 0x18A6
STRING: Suddenly, I sensed a presence. I turned around and looked down the hallway.

LABEL: 0x1949
STRING: The dim lighting soon turned to darkness.

LABEL: 0x1977
STRING: ...I couldn't see any light in the distance.

LABEL: 0x19A7
STRING: I couldn't feel anyone's presence.

LABEL: 0x1A2A
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x1A44
STRING: I definitely felt a disturbing atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x1ACF
STRING: A swirling malice mixed with intentionless chaos that had nothing to do with the former.

LABEL: 0x1B21
STRING: Something was happening.

LABEL: 0x1B43
STRING: Something――

LABEL: 0x1BB8
STRING: ...But.

LABEL: 0x1BD2
STRING: I turned around, unable to figure out what it was.

LABEL: 0x1F20
STRING: As soon as we reached the emergency room, Yukari was carried to the neighboring treatment room.

LABEL: 0x1F66
STRING: Hiragino lowered her quickly but carefully down on the bed,

LABEL: 0x1FA0
STRING: and took an empty syringe out of the rack.

LABEL: 0x203A
STRING: 「Sorry, Yukari. This might hurt a little, but bear with it.」

LABEL: 0x2073
STRING: He took off her jacket and rolled up the sleeves of her shirt.

LABEL: 0x20F5
STRING: He then stiffened up as if noticing something.

LABEL: 0x2131
STRING: His face turned pale.

LABEL: 0x214B
STRING: Beads of sweat ran down his forehead.

LABEL: 0x217B
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...?」

LABEL: 0x21C6
STRING: 「...Could you leave us for a moment, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x2211
STRING: 「S-Sure...」

LABEL: 0x229B
STRING: I did as he asked and left the treatment room.

LABEL: 0x22CB
STRING: I had no choice but to leave the rest to Hiragino...

LABEL: 0x258E
STRING: I'd been in the emergency room for a little over half an hour.

LABEL: 0x25B8
STRING: Hiragino opened the door of the treatment room.

LABEL: 0x268A
STRING: In his arms he held Yukari, who still appeared to be unconscious.

LABEL: 0x2754
STRING: 「Sorry, but could you prepare the bed?」

LABEL: 0x2791
STRING: 「...Is she still...?」

LABEL: 0x27CA
STRING: 「I don't know...」

LABEL: 0x27EB
STRING: Sweat ran down Hiragino's forehead.

LABEL: 0x2827
STRING: He had treated Yukari as soon as we arrived in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x285F
STRING: He was alone in there for more than half an hour, using the same medical robot as before.

LABEL: 0x2897
STRING: With my left half still numb, I just sat by the bedside next to the sleeping Touri, who was still oblivious to what was happening.

LABEL: 0x28ED
STRING: And I, who did know, could still do nothing to help.

LABEL: 0x2927
STRING: I shook her shoulders lightly.

LABEL: 0x2964
STRING: 「What's wrong...?」

LABEL: 0x298B
STRING: I woke Touri up without telling her what had transpired while she was asleep and helped her up.

LABEL: 0x29E5
STRING: She looked bewildered, or rather, confused.

LABEL: 0x2A27
STRING: Hiragino carried Yukari onto the bed with both arms and laid her down.

LABEL: 0x2A6F
STRING: She was still out cold.

LABEL: 0x2A91
STRING: Her expression hadn't changed, but perhaps because of her high fever, her breathing was somewhat ragged.

LABEL: 0x2AD3
STRING: I looked back to Touri as she tugged at the hem of my shirt.

LABEL: 0x2B75
STRING: 「What's wrong with Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x2BA4
STRING: 「She'll be fine...」

LABEL: 0x2BCC
STRING: I didn't know how much I should tell her.

LABEL: 0x2C10
STRING: I turned to Hiragino for help.

LABEL: 0x2CC7
STRING: Hiragino didn't say a word.

LABEL: 0x2CE9
STRING: He was still staring down at Yukari's face.

LABEL: 0x2D17
STRING: What was he thinking, standing there silently with pursed lips, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x2D63
STRING: The heavy atmosphere made it impossible for me or Touri to say anything.

LABEL: 0x2DBD
STRING: I didn't even know what to think. The silence was so oppressive that I had a hard time breathing properly.

LABEL: 0x2E07
STRING: Only the sound of Yukari's breathing marked the passage of time.

LABEL: 0x2E4A
STRING: 「――It was faster in Momoi's case.」

LABEL: 0x2E79
STRING: After a long, long silence, Hiragino sighed.

LABEL: 0x2EB3
STRING: It was like he had given up and accepted something he'd wanted to deny.

LABEL: 0x2F05
STRING: ...What did he mean by "faster?"

LABEL: 0x2F3B
STRING: Before I could ask him, Hiragino continued.

LABEL: 0x303C
STRING: 「There's a good chance she's infected.」

LABEL: 0x30D4
STRING: 「Infected? By <COOS>――?」

LABEL: 0x31CB
STRING: 「――I used the sequencer.」

LABEL: 0x31F3
STRING: 「If a virus is detected, there's no way to treat it except with a cure.」

LABEL: 0x3242
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0x3271
STRING: 「I'll leave her here.」

LABEL: 0x32DF
STRING: 「...That's the only thing I can do for her.」

LABEL: 0x3320
STRING: I could see an exhausted expression on Hiragino's face as he exhaled deeply.

LABEL: 0x3360
STRING: Even though we didn't know when her symptoms would worsen, he was taking it all on by himself.

LABEL: 0x33B2
STRING: He was probably the one who wanted to be by Yukari's side the most as she grew weaker and weaker.

LABEL: 0x3407
STRING: 「A virus? What are you talking about...?」

LABEL: 0x3439
STRING: 「We finally got rid of <COOS>, so why...?」

LABEL: 0x34D7
STRING: Touri appeared out of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x3501
STRING: She hadn't quite awoken from her sleep yet, but she seemed to understand the gravity of the situation.

LABEL: 0x362A
STRING: 「Will... she be alright?」

LABEL: 0x364E
STRING: 「She's injured, she looks like she's in pain, and she won't wake up....」

LABEL: 0x36C4
STRING: Hiragino paused.

LABEL: 0x36EC
STRING: He mumbled and scratched his head, as if he was having trouble saying it.

LABEL: 0x371C
STRING: His tone was almost faltering, a far cry from his earlier assertiveness.

LABEL: 0x37A2
STRING: ...What was he so hesitant about?

LABEL: 0x37C6
STRING: I turned back to Touri.

LABEL: 0x384B
STRING: 「Seems like she's not infected by <COOS>... but by a lethal virus.」

LABEL: 0x38FF
STRING: 「A virus...」

LABEL: 0x392C
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun――」

LABEL: 0x394F
STRING: Hiragino reproached me in a low voice.

LABEL: 0x3971
STRING: However, there was no way I could stay silent now.

LABEL: 0x3A77
STRING: 「Now that it's come to this, she should know too.」

LABEL: 0x3AB1
STRING: 「What if we hide it, and she gets infected with <Alice> without knowing?」

LABEL: 0x3B0D
STRING: 「If she knows, she might be able to prevent it.」

LABEL: 0x3BAB
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x3BDE
STRING: He was still being evasive.

LABEL: 0x3C06
STRING: 「Is it because she's a kid?」

LABEL: 0x3C30
STRING: 「Isn't this the same as how there's no distinction between crew and passengers in a situation like this?」

LABEL: 0x3C6E
STRING: 「There shouldn't be a distinction between adults and children, either.」

LABEL: 0x3D32
STRING: 「So, you'd tell her everything and let her suffer without a second thought?」

LABEL: 0x3D81
STRING: 「As long as we're there to protect her, there's no problem.」

LABEL: 0x3DC7
STRING: 「We're at just as much risk of being infected by <Alice> as well.」

LABEL: 0x3E0D
STRING: 「We should tell her what we can.」

LABEL: 0x3E51
STRING: 「If you don't have the right information when the time comes, you can't make the right choice.」

LABEL: 0x3ED3
STRING: If Hiragino was right,

LABEL: 0x3EFF
STRING: then telling Touri would only serve to make her more afraid.

LABEL: 0x3FB1
STRING: But, we no longer had the luxury to take that into consideration.

LABEL: 0x4054
STRING: We were at the bottom of the sea where no light could reach.

LABEL: 0x4076
STRING: We had no idea what lived down here, who would become our enemy, or where they lurked.

LABEL: 0x40DA
STRING: We were out of our depth in this natural state of constant struggle, separated from the controlled world protected by Big Brother.

LABEL: 0x4141
STRING: There was no beast in this vast deep sea to herald the end.

LABEL: 0x4179
STRING: Only the myriad of tiny and strange creatures that were desperate to survive the day existed here.

LABEL: 0x4224
STRING: And so, all we could do was――

LABEL: 0x4366
STRING: 「I want Touri to think about it with us.」

LABEL: 0x4408
STRING: 「Think?」

LABEL: 0x4427
STRING: 「Yeah... About what we should do.」

LABEL: 0x4475
STRING: I told her exactly what we had just learned.

LABEL: 0x44B1
STRING: I told her about the <Alice>-virus, about its carrier, Hikari,

LABEL: 0x44FF
STRING: and about how Hiragino and I might already be infected.

LABEL: 0x453B
STRING: About how Yukari had collapsed.

LABEL: 0x4559
STRING: And, about what Hiragino and Yukari had told me, and what actually happened.

LABEL: 0x45A5
STRING: Once I was finished with my explanation, Touri asked me something with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x4649
STRING: 「...You said that there was a cure inside the <SHEEP III>, right?」

LABEL: 0x4693
STRING: 「It was supposed to be in the laboratory, but we couldn't find it.」

LABEL: 0x46E0
STRING: 「What do you mean, you couldn't find it?」

LABEL: 0x471D
STRING: 「Someone must've taken it... There was an empty space where it should've been.」

LABEL: 0x4775
STRING: I told her what I saw.

LABEL: 0x479B
STRING: But that didn't mean the cure didn't exist or that it had been lost.

LABEL: 0x47E9
STRING: If it was simply "stolen," then we just had to get it back.

LABEL: 0x481B
STRING: ――There was still hope.

LABEL: 0x48A9
STRING: 「So, we just have to get the cure back from someone, right?」

LABEL: 0x48EE
STRING: 「Yeah. But I don't have a clue who stole it or when...」

LABEL: 0x49A0
STRING: 「Can't you use that opal thing Yukari-san used before?」

LABEL: 0x49E5
STRING: 「It's not an opal, it's an <Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0x4A19
STRING: They were definitely the same kind of jewels, but...

LABEL: 0x4A45
STRING: I thought about retorting, but wasn't her idea worth considering?

LABEL: 0x4AB5
STRING: 「If we pull information from the <Onyx> like Yukari-san did, then surely――」

LABEL: 0x4B0F
STRING: It wasn't impossible.

LABEL: 0x4B33
STRING: ...But, where was the <Onyx> right now?

LABEL: 0x4B75
STRING: I didn't even know what shape the thing was.

LABEL: 0x4BB5
STRING: If it was used to load data into smart glasses, then it was probably small enough to carry on you...

LABEL: 0x4C19
STRING: Would Hiragino know about it?

LABEL: 0x4C45
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x4C7D
STRING: Hm?

LABEL: 0x4CE9
STRING: Ah, what is it?」

LABEL: 0x4D0E
STRING: Hiragino had kept silent while I was talking, leaning his back against the wall in deep thought.

LABEL: 0x4D64
STRING: I thought he was being unusually quiet... Did he doze off?

LABEL: 0x4DA6
STRING: I couldn't blame him. He had been busy with treating people in these extreme circumstances.

LABEL: 0x4DFA
STRING: All the while he himself wasn't feeling well either...

LABEL: 0x4E28
STRING: I asked as simply as possible, feeling sorry for the sleepy Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x4E70
STRING: 「Do you know what this <Onyx> looks like?」

LABEL: 0x4F1A
STRING: 「As the name implies, I guess it's a device that's all black.」

LABEL: 0x4F61
STRING: 「So, you've never actually seen it...」

LABEL: 0x4FA0
STRING: 「Yeah. Unfortunately.」

LABEL: 0x4FC2
STRING: 「In terms of size, it's apparently small enough to hold in one hand.」

LABEL: 0x5065
STRING: 「So, it's not that big.」

LABEL: 0x5096
STRING: 「Which means Yukari-san might still have it――」

LABEL: 0x50EB
STRING: 「No, she doesn't.」

LABEL: 0x5112
STRING: Hiragino denied it outright while rubbing his eyes.

LABEL: 0x5154
STRING: 「But, just in case――」

LABEL: 0x5193
STRING: 「I checked when I examined her. Besides――」

LABEL: 0x51D3
STRING: 「You absolutely must not touch her body.」

LABEL: 0x5228
STRING: Hiragino collapsed into the chair I offered to him as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x5278
STRING: How hard had he been pushing himself...?

LABEL: 0x52A6
STRING: Just then, I caught sight of Yukari's jacket that was rolled up near her pillow.

LABEL: 0x52F2
STRING: I grabbed it and searched through it to see if the <Onyx> was there, but to no avail.

LABEL: 0x5344
STRING: Then, where was this thing...?

LABEL: 0x53F9
STRING: Touri seemed to notice something and raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x542B
STRING: I looked at where she was pointing.

LABEL: 0x546B
STRING: 「...What's that?」

LABEL: 0x5491
STRING: Touri's eyes were fixed on something.

LABEL: 0x54AF
STRING: She was looking next to the bed where Yukari was sleeping. And there...

LABEL: 0x54E3
STRING: ...There lay the unassuming wristband Yukari had been wearing around her arm.

LABEL: 0x552B
STRING: As it rolled down, it emitted light.

LABEL: 0x555D
STRING: An artificial light that was different from both the supernatural light of <COOS> and the natural light of the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x55AB
STRING: Was it some sort of a device...?

LABEL: 0x55E4
STRING: 「Isn't that POL――」

LABEL: 0x560E
STRING: 「――Oh, you're right.」

LABEL: 0x5634
STRING: I was reminded of how Yukari had used it by holding up her wrist.

LABEL: 0x567A
STRING: Right, it was a wearable communication device.

LABEL: 0x56AE
STRING: The design was like that probably because the attendants were hesitant to operate electronic devices on the ship,

LABEL: 0x56EE
STRING: where their use had been restricted.

LABEL: 0x573C
STRING: It was a cheap-looking communication device, and at this point, it was only useful for contacting POL.

LABEL: 0x57AC
STRING: 「There!」

LABEL: 0x57D1
STRING: As she exclaimed, Touri reached out and grabbed the silver bracelet.

LABEL: 0x580F
STRING: It happened so fast that I didn't have time to stop her from touching the thing Yukari had worn.

LABEL: 0x5869
STRING: Would it be better to hold onto it for now?

LABEL: 0x58A9
STRING: While I hesitated, Touri put the wristband on her arm.

LABEL: 0x595B
STRING: 「All right! Does it look good on me?」

LABEL: 0x5982
STRING: 「Uh, sure...」

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: 「Wow, her arms are so thin―」

LABEL: 0x5A33
STRING: Touri, posing lightly, looked like a schoolboy who had just been bought a costume set.

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: It really did look like a toy.

LABEL: 0x5AC5
STRING: Not only was it easy to remove, but it was so light that you could drop it by accident.

LABEL: 0x5B15
STRING: Even if we had the ability to communicate with the brains of this ship, POL, there was still a power outage going on.

LABEL: 0x5B69
STRING: In this environment, where emergency power was barely enough to support the lighting,

LABEL: 0x5BBB
STRING: it was truly nothing more than a child's toy.

LABEL: 0x5BFB
STRING: ...Touri touched the buttons on the bracelet, making it flash, but nothing more.

LABEL: 0x5C65
STRING: 「I hope this'll be of some use...」

LABEL: 0x5CA1
STRING: No. Finding the <Onyx> came first.

LABEL: 0x5CDF
STRING: The fact that Yukari had used it meant that we had to retrace her steps.

LABEL: 0x5D31
STRING: She had probably gone to the wheelhouse... and the warehouse in the rear section, too.

LABEL: 0x5D7B
STRING: Hopefully, she would regain consciousness soon...

LABEL: 0x5DCA
STRING: 「POL, answer me!」

LABEL: 0x5DF0
STRING: Touri spoke to the wristband in the same manner as Yukari did the other day.

LABEL: 0x5E36
STRING: There was something awkward in the way she mimicked her.

LABEL: 0x5F31
STRING: 「POL, POL!」

LABEL: 0x5F57
STRING: There was no response... Just as I expected.

LABEL: 0x5F7D
STRING: With the emergency power supply just barely keeping things running,

LABEL: 0x5FB7
STRING: disabling the dialogue system of POL would be one of the first things to be cut off.

LABEL: 0x60BF
STRING: 「POL!

LABEL: 0x6183
STRING: POOOOOOOOOOOOL!」

LABEL: 0x61B1
STRING: Was she getting desperate or just playing around?

LABEL: 0x61E5
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, there was no way something like that would work.

LABEL: 0x621F
STRING: Just as she was about to give up――

LABEL: 0x6292
STRING: 【Yes?】

LABEL: 0x62A8
STRING: Seriously?

LABEL: 0x62BE
STRING: A familiar androgynous voice echoed inside the room.

LABEL: 0x62E6
STRING: It was the voice of POL, the brains behind ROMLES' most advanced cruise submarine.

LABEL: 0x632C
STRING: I never expected a response from it under these circumstances...

LABEL: 0x63BD
STRING: 「No... Wait.」

LABEL: 0x63DD
STRING: Something was strange.

LABEL: 0x6452
STRING: I surveyed the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x6476
STRING: There were devices to call POL installed at several locations.

LABEL: 0x64AA
STRING: At the bedside, near Hiragino's desk, and a few other places.

LABEL: 0x64F3
STRING: There was no reaction at all when we had spoken to the equipment installed on the ship.

LABEL: 0x653B
STRING: Besides, if I hadn't misheard...

LABEL: 0x6567
STRING: POL's voice was coming directly from the wristband――

LABEL: 0x65A6
STRING: 「Could it be that it's built into that bracelet?」

LABEL: 0x65E8
STRING: If so, it made sense.

LABEL: 0x660C
STRING: The one responding to us right now was a subset of POL, isolated from the <SHEEP III> itself.

LABEL: 0x6661
STRING: It was probably part of an independent database from the time of the accident, or even before that.

LABEL: 0x66B1
STRING: If that was the case, then it had no records of what had happened on the ship after the accident...

LABEL: 0x6705
STRING: Touri asked POL again.

LABEL: 0x679A
STRING: 「POL, where's the cure for <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0x67D8
STRING: 【It doesn't exist.】

LABEL: 0x67F6
STRING: As I thought... There was no point in asking.

LABEL: 0x681E
STRING: This was an artificial intelligence that had only enough memory to be placed inside a tiny wristband.

LABEL: 0x6870
STRING: Asking about the current location of the <Onyx> or the cure wouldn't yield any results.

LABEL: 0x68CD
STRING: 「Then... Who stole the virus?」

LABEL: 0x6904
STRING: 【No one stole it.】

LABEL: 0x6928
STRING: A pointless question.

LABEL: 0x6946
STRING: A useless answer from an omniscient brain.

LABEL: 0x6970
STRING: The excitement I felt of POL activating quickly faded away.

LABEL: 0x6A0D
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x6A29
STRING: 「Please help Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x6A6E
STRING: Touri's voice, which sounded like it was squeezed out, must have been her heartfelt wish containing no falsehoods.

LABEL: 0x6ACE
STRING: She had thought POL could help.

LABEL: 0x6AEC
STRING: Her hopes that some progress would be made were quickly crushed.

LABEL: 0x6B38
STRING: I couldn't respond to her weak, whispering voice.

LABEL: 0x6B86
STRING: 【Are you all right?】

LABEL: 0x6BA4
STRING: Instead, it was POL who responded.

LABEL: 0x6C5F
STRING: 【You seem tired, Nomura Touri.】

LABEL: 0x6C8D
STRING: 【Or, did something painful happen?】

LABEL: 0x6CC5
STRING: The AI offered her words of comfort as if it were a human being.

LABEL: 0x6D07
STRING: Touri looked at the wristband with wide eyes.

LABEL: 0x6D50
STRING: 「Yukari-san is the one having a hard time.」

LABEL: 0x6D76
STRING: 「And Tokiwa-chan... is already gone.」

LABEL: 0x6DAE
STRING: 「Even Reiri hasn't come back for some time now...」

LABEL: 0x6E1C
STRING: 「I'm not smart, and there isn't much I can do to help...」

LABEL: 0x6E5E
STRING: 「I'm always relying on everyone else while doing nothing, and yet somehow I'm the one who's completely fine...」

LABEL: 0x6F35
STRING: 「I don't know what to do...」

LABEL: 0x6F6E
STRING: Touri let out her feelings to the wristband.

LABEL: 0x6FA8
STRING: POL was easy to talk to since you couldn't see it, and it was friendly and helpful.

LABEL: 0x6FE7
STRING: Maybe that was why she could be more honest with it than with me or Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x703B
STRING: 【That must've been hard.】

LABEL: 0x705F
STRING: 【Nomura Touri, in times like this, you need to take a breather.】

LABEL: 0x709D
STRING: 【Let me give you a quiz. Okay, here we go. On this planet, in the middle of summer...】

LABEL: 0x7123
STRING: POL was comforting Touri.

LABEL: 0x7148
STRING: Honestly, it was something I should be doing...

LABEL: 0x7184
STRING: I felt completely worthless.

LABEL: 0x71AE
STRING: Touri occasionally nodded in response to POL's calm voice.

LABEL: 0x71ED
STRING: ...It seemed that I could leave her to POL for the time being.

LABEL: 0x7248
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x7260
STRING: There was something strange about Touri's behavior.

LABEL: 0x7294
STRING: I hadn't seen Reiri since I'd woken up.

LABEL: 0x72CC
STRING: At first, I thought it would only be for a short time, but she was still missing.

LABEL: 0x731A
STRING: There were times in the past when she had gone missing as well,

LABEL: 0x735C
STRING: but how had Touri acted during those times?

LABEL: 0x7394
STRING: It was true that she was shocked by the recent series of events,

LABEL: 0x73EE
STRING: but her behavior was clearly different from before.

LABEL: 0x747B
STRING: ――Touri was too calm in Reiri's absence.

LABEL: 0x74BD
STRING: Before, she had acted almost mad when her sister wasn't there.

LABEL: 0x75BC
STRING: Why was she so calm this time?

LABEL: 0x75FA
STRING: Did she know where Reiri was?

LABEL: 0x7628
STRING: Or――

LABEL: 0x765C
STRING: My thoughts became hazy.

LABEL: 0x767E
STRING: In the end, I had no idea what was going on.

LABEL: 0x76AE
STRING: Who exactly had stolen the cure?

LABEL: 0x76DC
STRING: We couldn't find the <Onyx>, and we couldn't rely on POL――

LABEL: 0x7789
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x779B
STRING: The choices had been narrowed down.

LABEL: 0x77C1
STRING: I knew it, didn't I?

LABEL: 0x77E7
STRING: There were a limited number of people who could have stolen the cure down here in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x7831
STRING: One possibility was the man who had been attacked by <COOS> along with Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7879
STRING: However, what kind of motive could he have?

LABEL: 0x78AF
STRING: If it wasn't him, then... was it her?

LABEL: 0x7944
STRING: The girl whose thoughts were an enigma to me.

LABEL: 0x7974
STRING: I remembered the weight I'd felt when I carried her on my back, along with her faint warmth.

LABEL: 0x79B6
STRING: I thought she was opening up to us a little...

LABEL: 0x7A79
STRING: A subdued electronic sound echoed in the room.

LABEL: 0x7AA3
STRING: The source of the sound was the sequencer on Hiragino's desk.

LABEL: 0x7AE1
STRING: It carried the result of whether Yukari was infected with <Alice> or not...

LABEL: 0x7B23
STRING: Hiragino suddenly appeared and stopped the beeping.

LABEL: 0x7BBE
STRING: 「Are you feeling better now, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x7C1A
STRING: He stared at his desk in silence.

LABEL: 0x7C4A
STRING: He didn't say a word.

LABEL: 0x7C66
STRING: He said nothing... but, his expression was stiff.

LABEL: 0x7C96
STRING: That alone told me everything.

LABEL: 0x7CDA
STRING: Hiragino eventually turned around and glanced at the sleeping Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7D48
STRING: "I'm going," he might have said.

LABEL: 0x7D7E
STRING: There were no longer any words exchanged between them.

LABEL: 0x7DB2
STRING: Unable to say anything, he left the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x8060
STRING: Hiragino walked out into the hallway with conviction.

LABEL: 0x80F7
STRING: 「Where are you――」

LABEL: 0x8189
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x81A5
STRING: 「...I don't know, but there's no point in staying here.」

LABEL: 0x81E8
STRING: He spoke quickly and with difficulty, as if trying to convince himself.

LABEL: 0x829A
STRING: 「Let's just find a way out of here as soon as possible.」

LABEL: 0x82D5
STRING: 「What about <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0x8303
STRING: 「Are we not going to look for the cure?」

LABEL: 0x8341
STRING: More than anything, now that Yukari had collapsed, that seemed like the most important thing to do.

LABEL: 0x83F5
STRING: 「Without any clues...?」

LABEL: 0x8425
STRING: 「Even if this is a closed space, searching the entirety of the <SHEEP III> is not a good idea.」

LABEL: 0x847D
STRING: 「That's... true, but――」

LABEL: 0x84BF
STRING: Hiragino slowed his pace a little.

LABEL: 0x84E7
STRING: Staring at his back, I asked.

LABEL: 0x850D
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x852B
STRING: 「――Can I ask you one thing?」

LABEL: 0x85C9
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x85E4
STRING: 「It's about Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x8604
STRING: His face stiffened for a moment.

LABEL: 0x862A
STRING: 「Let's say we can't find a cure on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x8674
STRING: 「But, if we manage to escape to the surface,

LABEL: 0x86BE
STRING: we can still save her by administering the cure then... right?」

LABEL: 0x870C
STRING: She had told us that <Alice> was a lethal virus.

LABEL: 0x8748
STRING: If that was true... then how much time did she have?

LABEL: 0x87FA
STRING: Yes.」

LABEL: 0x8813
STRING: ...Which was it?

LABEL: 0x882F
STRING: Hiragino confirmed after a moment.

LABEL: 0x8859
STRING: Was he being sincere or lying out of consideration...?

LABEL: 0x88B7
STRING: Hiragino, who appeared to have no grasp on the situation, hurried onward without looking back.

LABEL: 0x8914
STRING: 「So, don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x893A
STRING: 「What we need to focus on is getting back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x8972
STRING: 「If we do that, Yukari, and all of us... will be saved.」

LABEL: 0x8A14
STRING: Hiragino's soft voice led us forward.

LABEL: 0x8A4E
STRING: Down the spiral staircase and into the swirling abyss――

LABEL: 0x8A88
STRING: ――Were there any clues somewhere, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x8B87
STRING: 「...If we're going in order, the warehouse?」

LABEL: 0x8BBA
STRING: 「I'm not sure...」

LABEL: 0x8BDA
STRING: 「Sure, there might be something useful in there, but――」

LABEL: 0x8C3E
STRING: ――Tap.

LABEL: 0x8C58
STRING: 「Wait!」

LABEL: 0x8C7F
STRING: 「――What is it?」

LABEL: 0x8CA4
STRING: I felt something hitting my toes.

LABEL: 0x8CCC
STRING: I held out my arm to stop Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x8CFC
STRING: A hard but somewhat light object.

LABEL: 0x8D2A
STRING: This was...?

LABEL: 0x8D44
STRING: 「A plastic bottle...」

LABEL: 0x8DD2
STRING: 「It's Dividing Dry!」

LABEL: 0x8E23
STRING: I was too horrified to even utter the name out loud.

LABEL: 0x8E55
STRING: It had been a key player in the <COOS> extermination operation.

LABEL: 0x8E7D
STRING: I looked down the dimly lit hallway to find bits of the bottles lying around.

LABEL: 0x8F39
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, do you think we can use these to escape?」

LABEL: 0x8F78
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x8F92
STRING: ...What was this girl talking about?

LABEL: 0x8FC0
STRING: Sure, if we headed to the warehouse, there would still be a considerable amount of Dividing Dry left there.

LABEL: 0x903A
STRING: ...Actually, that was the only option...

LABEL: 0x906A
STRING: Right. So this was the key to our escape, after all.

LABEL: 0x90B6
STRING: That had to be it.

LABEL: 0x90D4
STRING: Lend us your strength again, Dividing Dry――

LABEL: 0x911C
STRING: 「――That's right, buoyancy!」

LABEL: 0x9140
STRING: The diving suit was still in good shape.

LABEL: 0x915E
STRING: All we had to do was attach these bottles of Dividing Dry to create some buoyancy and ascend the sea.

LABEL: 0x91C0
STRING: It was the same as when we were luring out <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x91F2
STRING: The legend of the most powerful plastic bottle wouldn't end yet――

LABEL: 0x92F1
STRING: 「Unfortunately, that's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x938D
STRING: 「Why's that?」

LABEL: 0x93FE
STRING: 「We won't know until we try!」

LABEL: 0x9444
STRING: 「Do you think that bottle can withstand the pressure of the deep sea?」

LABEL: 0x950F
STRING: Touri was refuted in a single sentence.

LABEL: 0x9539
STRING: Now that he mentioned it, it was obvious... I knew that, but...

LABEL: 0x9583
STRING: 「It doesn't have to be a bottle of Dividing Dry.」

LABEL: 0x95C3
STRING: 「Basically, as long as we have buoyancy, we're good.」

LABEL: 0x95F5
STRING: 「If we do that, we'll be able to go to the surface using the diving suit!」

LABEL: 0x9643
STRING: 「If we remove the extra weight and stuff from the suit, I'm sure we can make it lighter...」

LABEL: 0x96AC
STRING: 「It's useless.」

LABEL: 0x96C9
STRING: Hiragino answered immediately.

LABEL: 0x96E5
STRING: He cut me off without any room for rebuttal.

LABEL: 0x9796
STRING: 「Why do you say that?」

LABEL: 0x97C0
STRING: 「There's plenty of things on this ship that could help us float――」

LABEL: 0x981D
STRING: 「I know. This isn't about buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0x985C
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head and continued like he was having trouble finding the right words.

LABEL: 0x98A5
STRING: 「We can't use the diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x98CC
STRING: 「Why are you saying that? We used it just fine yesterday, didn't we――」

LABEL: 0x9935
STRING: 「Because of the shock.」

LABEL: 0x9966
STRING: Back when I was knocked out in the steam room――

LABEL: 0x999E
STRING: The shock had made me lose consciousness instantly.

LABEL: 0x99C8
STRING: And, I was left in a high-temperature space like that for a long time...

LABEL: 0x9A0D
STRING: 「Your life was just barely spared, but you were badly hurt.」

LABEL: 0x9A53
STRING: 「The diving suit must have taken some damage as well.」

LABEL: 0x9A92
STRING: 「Don't we have two suits?」

LABEL: 0x9ABA
STRING: 「Even if only one person makes it out, if they lead a rescue team――」

LABEL: 0x9B17
STRING: 「――Listen to me.」

LABEL: 0x9B46
STRING: His voice was harsh.

LABEL: 0x9B64
STRING: Was he saying there was still more――?

LABEL: 0x9B96
STRING: Hiragino took out a xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x9C3A
STRING: 「Sorry if I sounded harsh...」

LABEL: 0x9C6C
STRING: 「I might be losing my head a bit.」

LABEL: 0x9CAA
STRING: 「But... listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0x9CD2
STRING: 「A diving suit isn't the only thing we need. We need an oxygen tank as well.」

LABEL: 0x9D21
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0x9D47
STRING: After several undersea explorations, I also knew that it was already used up to some extent.

LABEL: 0x9D9B
STRING: It was none other than me who had used it.

LABEL: 0x9DC9
STRING: However, there should be a spare tank in the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x9E01
STRING: If we used that――

LABEL: 0x9E8B
STRING: 「There's no oxygen left.」

LABEL: 0x9ECC
STRING: I could only flinch after hearing his unexpected words.

LABEL: 0x9EFE
STRING: ...Since when?

LABEL: 0x9F18
STRING: How was there no oxygen left―――?

LABEL: 0x9FBC
STRING: 「It was all used in your operation.」

LABEL: 0xA006
STRING: 「I needed a lot of oxygen during your operation,

LABEL: 0xA040
STRING: and the oxygen in the emergency room wasn't enough.」

LABEL: 0xA082
STRING: 「So I asked Touri-kun to bring me all the oxygen tanks from the warehouse.」

LABEL: 0xA0DF
STRING: What――?

LABEL: 0xA163
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0xA192
STRING: 「We can't use the diving suits to escape.」
